DOC.brief_title: Bowel , Urinary Sexual Function After Laparoscopic Colorectal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: There report laparoscopically assist rectal resection associate high rate male sexual dysfunction compare open approach . But report study retrospectively . We examine frequency bowel , urinary sexual dysfunction prospectively patient receive laparoscopic colorectal surgery . We examine operation , 7 day , 3 month , 6 month 12 month operation , questionnaires ( International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) 、Short Form-8 ( SF8 ) 、International Consultation Incontinence Questionnaire-Short Form ( ICIQ-SF ) 、International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) 、Gastro-Intestinal Functional Outcome ( GIFO ) ) function test ( uroflowmetry US ) .
